Definition: In this task, you will be given a public comment from an online platform. Your task is to classify the comment into one of two classes: identity-attack or non-identity-attack. An identity attack is any comment that is rude or disrespectful about someone's identity, including appearance, race, gender, and sexual orientation. A non-identity-attack is any comment that is not an identity attack.
